sentence.Network_en: He was surprised at the singularity of the stranger's appearance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对那个陌生人独特的外貌感到惊讶。

sentence.Network_en: He was still more surprised at the singularity of the stranger's appearance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到那个陌生人的外表非常古怪而更加惊异了.

sentence.Network_en: The singularity arises only formally, because we neglected the effect of damping.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个奇异点的产生仅仅是形式上的, 因为我们忽略了阻尼的作用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 奇点(SINGULARITY) 可用奇异黎曼几何理论(此理论发现于90年代末，近8年内)改进，从而可以代替量子论进行奇点的计算。
一奇异点 (singularity), 克服这点的方法就是 “避开它”, 作一个半径为ρ, 以 (0, 0) 为圆心的圆 B ρ 考虑区域 R ′ = R−B ρ , ∂R ′.
生奇异性 (singularity) 之问题；实证上删除任何一条方程式，所估计的参数结果，将不
...以更强的普遍性和同一性为目标的，而艺术却总想要创造特殊性（singularity）和一次性的事物，现在，艺术越来越与科学技术结合 …

list.abs: singular eigenfunction 奇异特征函数singular integral 奇异积分singular matrix 退化矩阵
singular matrix 退化阵singular operator 奇异算子singular ordinal 特异序数
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... singular 奇的 singular matrix 奇异矩阵; 不可逆矩阵 skew distribution 偏斜分布.
singular elliptic function 奇异椭圆函数singular function 奇异函数singular function of bounded variation 有界变差奇异函数.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French singularite, from late Latin singularitas, from singularis 'alone (of its kind') (see singular)

entry.def: The singular form of a word is the form that is used when referring to one person or thing.

example.ex: ...the fifteen case endings of the singular form of the Finnish noun...
example.tran: 芬兰语的名词单数形式的 15 种格尾

example.ex: The word 'you' can be singular or plural.
example.tran: 单词 you 可以是单数也可以是复数。

entry.def: The singular of a noun is the form of it that is used to refer to one person or thing.

example.ex: The singular of Inuit is Inuk.
example.tran: Inuit (依努依特人)的单数形式是 Inuk。

entry.def: Singular means very great and remarkable.

example.ex: Barre was quickly drawn into the electoral arena, although with singular lack of success.
example.tran: 尽管胜算微乎其微，巴雷还是很快被身不由己地推到了选举的舞台上。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as singular, you mean that they are strange or unusual.

example.ex: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character...
example.tran: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

example.ex: Where he got that singular notion I just can't think.
example.tran: 我真想不出来他从哪来的那种奇怪念头。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being one of a kind;

sentences.sentence: "that singularity distinguished him from all his companions"

means.word_mean: 2. strangeness by virtue of being remarkable or unusual

auth_sentence.content: In this scenario a singularity contains no matter whatsoever.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this scenario a singularity contains no matter whatsoever.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this scenario a singularity contains no matter whatsoever.

auth_sentence.content: Hence universe does not get sucked into the singularity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hence universe does not get sucked into the singularity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hence universe does not get sucked into the singularity.

auth_sentence.content: Teleportation could be achieved by a naked singularity wormhole.
auth_sentence.res_content: Teleportation could be achieved by a naked singularity wormhole.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Teleportation could be achieved by a naked singularity wormhole.
